comments.body: Ah, I see. This change makes `ResolveCreateNamedStruct` simpler. The fix seems smart.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +347,351 @@      // We should always use the last part of the column name (`c` in the above example) as the
      // alias name inside CreateNamedStruct.
      case (u: UnresolvedAttribute, _) => Seq(Literal(u.nameParts.last), u)
      case (e: NamedExpression, _) if e.resolved => Seq(Literal(e.name), e)
      case (e: NamedExpression, _) => Seq(NamePlaceholder, e)

comments.body: Could you clarify that the difference between `array_funcs` and `collection_funcs` in this context?
